title: Japan : number of internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of internet users in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
Overall Number of internet users in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Number of internet users in millions, of value 117.9 was reached at Year 2019,  2020, and 2021
Minimum Number of internet users in millions about 115.8 was reached at Year 2017
